name: virusmon
body:
# Welcome to virusmon page
virusmon is Computer Virus Monitoring Project. Using `clamav` for virus scanner, grab and parse the output, then send it to statistic collector.

# Target
Target of this project is to monitor computer viruses activity in Bandung City.

# License
This is Open Source project developed by [Insan Infonesia](http://www.insan.co.id) developer licensed under GPLv3
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
